uts.wsd.teamtwo.JAXB

Class Authors

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.JAXB.Authors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Authors
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The DTO that describes a collection of Author. Used for database storage, manipulation and XSLT display.
    Author:
    Abraham Silva, Deinyon L Davies
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • filterById

        public Authors filterById(long id)
        Filters the list to a collection of one Author with the given ID. Used for XSLT transformation where a single Author is required
        Parameters:
        id - The ID number of the Author to display
        Returns:
        A collection of one Author with the given ID number
